startbox 0.0.0.9000
  • Prise en main
  • Référence

Boxplot summary for an experiment

plot_xpbox.Rd

This function automatically generates a box plot

Utilisation

plot_xpbox(
  data,
  echelle = NULL,
  show_dots = FALSE,
  calculation_type = "frequence",
  ...
)

Arguments

data

Raw data containing at least plot_id, xp_trt_code and a "_PC" variable.

echelle

Upper limit of the y-axis (optional, otherwise automatic).

show_dots

displaying points

calculation_type

choice of calculation function used default frequency

...

other parameters for labs (title, x, y,fill)

Valeur de retour

A ggplot2 object.
